de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.control.commands

Class AbstractCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.control.commands.AbstractCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ButtonClick, ChangeSensorSensitivity, ConnectionAliveCheck, ConnectionRequest, ConnectionRequestResponse, DisplayNotification, EndConnection, HideReset, RemapPorts, ResetToCenter, SensorDescription, SensorRangeNotification, SetSensorCommand, SetSensorSpeed, UpdateButtonsMap, UpdateButtonsXML

    public abstract class AbstractCommand
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The base class for commands. All control messages subclass this so we can send them via a CommandConnection.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getCommandType

        public CommandType getCommandType()
        Retrieve the CommandType this command is. The command may be cast according to this, for example to a SetSensorCommand if the CommandType is SetSensor
        Returns:
        the CommandType of this command
